text: The A13 is an autoroute (motorway) in France. It goes between Paris and Caen. It also goes past Rouen and Le Harve. It is the oldest autoroute in France, as it first opened in 1946. It is used a lot by people going on holiday to the north coast of France. It is about long. ==Exits and juctions== Junction number & name Westbound exits Eastbound exits 1 Porte d'Auteuil Boulevard Périphérique Boulevard Périphérique Quai du 4 Septembre, Boulogne-Billancourt Avenue du Palais, Saint-Cloud Pont de Saint-Cloud, Saint-Cloud Route de Paris à Versailles, Saint-Cloud D182, Vaucresson D182, Vaucresson 6 N186, Louveciennes & A12 autoroute N186, Louveciennes & A12 autoroute 7 N13, Poissy & A14 autoroute N13, Poissy & A14 autoroute D43 & D44, Les Mureaux D43 & D44, Les Mureaux D19, Flins-sur-Seine D19, Flins-sur-Seine D130, Épône-Gargenville D130, Épône-Gargenville D65 (Route de Chantereine), Mantes-la-Ville D65 (Route de Chantereine), Mantes-la-Ville D928, Mantes-la-Jolie D928, Mantes-la-Jolie D110, Mantes-la-Jolie N15, Bonnières-sur-Seine N13, Chaufour-lès-Bonnières N13, Chaufour-lès-Bonnières D181, Pacy-sur-Eure & Vernon D181, Pacy-sur-Eure & Vernon D316, Gaillon D316, Gaillon N155, Louviers A154 & N15, Val-de-Reuil A154 D321, Elbeuf & Pont-de-l'Arche D321, Elbeuf & Pont-de-l'Arche D7, Elbeuf & Oissel D7, Elbeuf & Oissel 22 D18E, Oissel & A139, Rouen D18E, Oissel N338, Rouen Maison Brûlée N138 & N175, Moulineaux N138 & N175, Moulineaux A28, Bordeaux, Le Mans, Alençon D313, Bourg-Achard D313, Bourg-Achard D89 & N175, Pont-Audemer 27 A131 N175, Beuzeville N175, Beuzeville 29 A132 & D579, Pont-l'Évêque A132 & D579, Pont-l'Évêque La Haie Tondue N175, Annebault & Beaumont-en-Auge Péage de Dozulé D400, Houlgate, Dives, Cabourg & Dozulé D400, Houlgate, Dives, Cabourg & Dozulé Péage de Troarn N175, Troarn N175, Troarn 31 Porte de Paris Boulevard Périphérique (N814), N513 & D403, Mondeville Boulevard Périphérique (N814), N513 & D403, Mondeville ==References== Category:Autoroutes in France
